description.h5: A Horde of New 5th Edition Monsters!
description.p: Whether you need dungeon vermin or world-shaking villains, the Tome of Beasts 1 (2023 Edition) has it. This book presents more than 400 foes suitable for any campaign setting—from tiny drakes and peculiar spiders to demon lords and ancient dragons.
Tome of Beasts 1 (2023 Edition) introduces new foes and upgrades monsters that originally appeared in Tome of Beasts, including:

ul.li: Updates to include errata and streamline mechanics
11 new creatures like the ashwalker, planewatcher, and the ancient cave dragon
Expanded tables by creature type and terrain

description.p: Give your players encounters they won’t soon forget. Now easier to run than ever!
